doc.plot: 237 is the history of a single hotel room and the people that pass through it. It is a dark and voyeuristic drama about how seemingly ordinary people change when they spend time away from the context of their lives and in the totally disposable world of an anonymous hotel room.

237 is the history of a single hotel room and the people that pass through it. It is a dark and voyeuristic drama about how seemingly ordinary people change when they spend time away from the context of their lives and in the totally disposable world of an anonymous hotel room.
